casebody.data:
Louis R. KOERNER, Jr., Individually and as Assignee of Jean McCurdy Meade, Petitioner,
v.
CMR CONSTRUCTION & ROOFING, L.L.C. No. 18-1529 Supreme Court of the United States. October 7, 2019

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit denied.
